title: 求人帮我做个城镇保卫者的客户端
author: GG_bond
txt_content:
帮忙，我用不了城镇保卫者的mod
这个是保卫者mod地址http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-7346-1-1.html
麻烦传到网盘去

replies.author: GG_bond
replies.txt_content:
我吧城镇保卫者mod直接放到.mi
里面可是进去游戏后没有城镇保卫者专用的修改器，几乎没有变化也和不成那些弓箭手和剑士

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
呃... 你的意思是你不會裝MOD??想找人幫你裝嗎??
你安裝方法錯誤... 不是像你說的把它放到.mincraft

How to install:
1. It is always good to backup minecraft before instaling a new mod.
2. Install the latest modloader.
3. Delete META-INF from the minecraft.jar
5. Move the files from the "CastleDefese.rar" to bin/mincraft.jar. Use Winrar to open minecraft.jar.
6. Play

先找到 .mincraft\bin\mincraft.jar
用解壓縮軟件打開, 刪掉裡頭的 META-INF 文件夾
安裝 modloader (把壓縮檔內文件全丟進 mincraft.jar 裡頭)
再把 CastleDefese.rar 裡的文件全丟進 mincraft.jar 裡頭
就這樣...

replies.author: GG_bond
replies.txt_content:
well 发表于 2011-8-18 14:33
